info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 06 at 6:13PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...An area of showers with gusty winds will impact portions of southwestern Schenectady, Albany, Schoharie and southwestern Rensselaer Counties through 645 PM EST... At 611 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking an area of showers with gusty winds over Middleburgh, or 7 miles southeast of Cobleskill, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Albany, Troy, East Greenbush, Cohoes, Watervliet, Rensselaer, Colonie, Cobleskill, Delmar, Latham, Jefferson, Guilderland, Menands, Westerlo, Ravena, Berne, Voorheesville, Green Island, Altamont and Middleburgh. This includes the following highways... Interstate 88 between exits 20 and 23. Interstate 90 between exits 10 and 25. Interstate 87 between exits 21A and 7. Interstate 787 between exits 1 and 9. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
